title: Please Please Me, Any One Will Do
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
description: Color reproduction of a hand tinted photograph of two half dressed women seated in a embrace. Image bordered in red with multicolored diagonal striped across sheet. Text in orange script at top spells "Please Please Me" followed by "Any one will do !"Imprinted at center left in pink text reads " A story of illicit illusions / and forbidden fantasies" Imprinted at lower right in lavender and orange "PACIFIC COAST FILMS RELEASE [logo of film company], and in orange script lower right "Introducing Erica Strauss"
name: Poster
